message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name] - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. After careful consideration, I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [last working day, e.g., two weeks from today or as per company policy]. 

This decision was not made lightly, and I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I've had during my time here. I am proud of the accomplishments we have achieved together, and I truly appreciate your guidance and support throughout my tenure at [Company Name].

In order to ensure a smooth transition, I am willing to assist with training my replacement or providing any necessary documentation. Please let me know how I can best contribute during this period. 

I wish the company continued success in all its endeavors, and I am confident that [Company Name] will continue to thrive under your leadership. Thank you once again for everything, and please extend my gratitude to the rest of the team.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Company Name]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
